irtrusbot

Class IrcMessage

  • Object
    • IrcMessage

  • public class IrcMessage
extends Object
    IRC Privmsg/Notice class. Provides a manipulable representation of IRC Message type commands. Can be used to create, interpret, or validate PRIVMSG lines.
    Author:
    crashdemons

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      IrcOrigin from
      Origin object indicating information about the sender of the message.
      String text
      The message text being transmitted by the command between the sender and destination.
      String to
      Nickname or Channel-name of the destination for the message

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IrcMessage(IrcCommand ic)
      Interprets an IRC message (PRIVMSG) object from an generic IRC Command object.
      IrcMessage(IrcOrigin ofrom, String sto, String stext)
      Creates an IRC message (PRIVMSG) object from details about a message received or to be sent.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getEstimatedLength()
      Calculates the length of the server-sent format of the message.
      int getEstimatedRemaining()
      Calculates the remaining characters until the maximum IRC message length is reached.
      IrcMessage getReply(IrcOrigin replyfrom, String replytext, boolean direct)
      Generates an IRC Message in the form of a reply to given message.
      boolean isMessageValidLength()
      Determines if the message length is within IRC limitations.
      String toIncoming()
      Convert an IRC Message into the server-sent (incoming) string format.
      String toOutgoing()
      Convert an IRC Message into the client-sent (outgoing) string format.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • from

        public IrcOrigin from
        Origin object indicating information about the sender of the message.

      • to

        public String to
        Nickname or Channel-name of the destination for the message

      • text

        public String text
        The message text being transmitted by the command between the sender and destination.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IrcMessage

        public IrcMessage(IrcCommand ic)
           throws IrcMessageCommandException
        Interprets an IRC message (PRIVMSG) object from an generic IRC Command object.
        Parameters:
        ic - IRC Command object being interpreted as an IRC Message (PRIVMSG)
        Throws:
        IrcMessageCommandException - default exception for IRC Commands incompatible with IrcMessage.

      • IrcMessage

        public IrcMessage(IrcOrigin ofrom,
          String sto,
          String stext)
        Creates an IRC message (PRIVMSG) object from details about a message received or to be sent.
        Parameters:
        ofrom - Origin information about the sender of the message (necessary for length calculations)
        sto - Nickname for the destination of this message.
        stext - Text of the message being sent

    • Method Detail

      • toIncoming

        public String toIncoming()
        Convert an IRC Message into the server-sent (incoming) string format. This conversion is useful for determining the maximum message length, as both the incoming and outgoing commands must be under 512 chars.
        Returns:
        Incoming-formatted string representation of the IRC Message command eg. :nick!user@host PRIVMSG to :text.

      • toOutgoing

        public String toOutgoing()
        Convert an IRC Message into the client-sent (outgoing) string format. This conversion is used to prepare messages to be sent an IRC server.
        Returns:
        Outgoing-formatted string representation of the IRC Message command eg. PRIVMSG to :text.

      • getEstimatedLength

        public int getEstimatedLength()
        Calculates the length of the server-sent format of the message. Used to identify the consumption of the command char limit. This value is equivalent of IrcMessage.toIncoming().length() NOTE: this function requires the 'from' field to be filled out correctly for correct calculation.
        Returns:
        Length of the server-sent-format IRC command.

      • getEstimatedRemaining

        public int getEstimatedRemaining()
        Calculates the remaining characters until the maximum IRC message length is reached. NOTE: this function requires the 'from' field to be filled out correctly for correct calculation.
        Returns:
        Positive: Number of characters remaining. Negative: Number of characters over-limit.

      • isMessageValidLength

        public boolean isMessageValidLength()
        Determines if the message length is within IRC limitations. NOTE: this function requires the 'from' field to be filled out correctly for correct calculation. Equivalent to IrcMessage.getEstimatedRemaining()>=0
        Returns:
        True: message length is within limitations. False: message length is too high for an IRC Command.

      • getReply

        public IrcMessage getReply(IrcOrigin replyfrom,
                  String replytext,
                  boolean direct)
        Generates an IRC Message in the form of a reply to given message. This reply will be sent in a way that the 'from' field user will receive it. However, depending on the the original 'to' field, and the parameters given, this reply may be in the channel.
        Parameters:
        replyfrom - Origin information about the user replying to the message. (necessary for length calculations)
        replytext - Message to send in reply, to the sender of the first message.
        direct - Determines if the reply should be sent back directly (private message), or [conditionally] in the channel the first sender used.
        Returns:
        IrcMessage object for the reply message
